info.headline: Tornado Watch issued January 09 at 9:53AM EST until January 09 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 4 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 2 PM EST /1 PM CST/ THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN ALABAMA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST ALABAMA HENRY HOUSTON IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 14 COUNTIES IN BIG BEND FLORIDA DIXIE FRANKLIN GADSDEN JEFFERSON LAFAYETTE LEON LIBERTY MADISON TAYLOR WAKULLA IN PANHANDLE FLORIDA BAY CALHOUN GULF JACKSON IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 26 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL GEORGIA BEN HILL BERRIEN BROOKS COLQUITT COOK IRWIN LANIER LOWNDES THOMAS TIFT TURNER WORTH IN SOUTHWEST GEORGIA BAKER CALHOUN CLAY DECATUR DOUGHERTY EARLY GRADY LEE MILLER MITCHELL QUITMAN RANDOLPH SEMINOLE TERRELL THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABBA, ABBEVILLE, ABBEVILLE MUNICIPAL A/P, ABE SPRINGS, ADAMS BEACH, ADEL, ALBANY, ALFORDS, ALMA, APALACHICOLA,
